text: ya 'ayuha alnaas qad ja'atkum maweizat min rabikum tdhkkirkm eiqab allah wtkhwfkm weydh, wahi alquran wama ashtml ealayh min alayat walezat l'islah akhlaqkm waemalkm, wafih dwa' lamaa fi alqulub min aljahl walshrk wsayr alamrad, wrshd liman 'atabieh min alkhalq fynjyh min alhlak, jaealah subhanah wteala niemat warahmat llmwmnyn, wkhssahm bdhlk; li'anahum almntfewn bal'iyman, wa'amaa alkafirun fahu ealayhim eamaa
